pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Fixed-Effects Estimations // Fast and user-friendly estimation of econometric models with multiple fixed-effects. Includes ordinary least squares (OLS), generalized linear models (GLM) and the negative binomial. The core of the package is based on optimized parallel C++ code, scaling especially well for large data sets. The method to obtain the fixed- effects coefficients is based on Berge (2018) https://wwwen.uni .lu/content/download/110162/1299525/file/2018_13. Further provides tools to export and view the results of several estimations with intuitive design to cluster the standard- errors.
